page.title: 16GOODWIN FARM
page.content: Goodwin Farm has 100 acres of land. It is divided into sections for different crops. The farmer, Mr. Easy, farms wheat, beans, oil seed rape and barley. In the fields they have tram lines where the tractor runs through so it can spray the crops. In a big shed there are two corn bins to put the corn in when it has been cut. Mr. Easy has got a combine harvester to cut the corn. This year it will be cut in the first week of August owing to the bad weather making the harvest late. Goodwin Farm was part of the Goodwin Estate. Mr. Easy, the farmer has been farming for 43 years. He started farming when he was 14 years of age. He works the land mainly alone.
